name: raleqd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1)), wceq(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1)))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

comment: Equality deduction for restricted universal quantifier. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
